cause.description:
Another Hero Dies.
We're here to do something about it.
69% had new or worsened respiratory problems after 9/11
61% of people who had never had any respiratory problems before developed them after 9/11
28% of responders had abnormal breathing tests
31% had to seek medical treatment for WTC-related respiratory conditions and 17% had to miss work.
(UPDATE - 1/24/07) 4 Ground Zero First Responders have passed away in the last 6 weeks.
(UPDATE - 5/20/07) 3 Ground Zero First Responders passed away in a 10 day period from 5/8/07-5/18/07.
Spread the word.
The world needs to know.
http://www.artists4hope.org/
